Uses of Interface
org.hibernate.search.backend.jgroups.impl.NodeSelectorStrategy

  • Packages that use NodeSelectorStrategy 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.search.backend.jgroups.impl  

    • Uses of NodeSelectorStrategy in org.hibernate.search.backend.jgroups.impl

      Classes in org.hibernate.search.backend.jgroups.impl that implement NodeSelectorStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AutoNodeSelector
      This NodeSelectorStrategy picks a single master across all nodes participating in the JGroups cluster deterministically: this way all nodes in the group will have an agreement on which node is going to be the master.
      class  MasterNodeSelector
      This NodeSelectorStrategy is a static configuration for the local node to always process index operations locally, and accept index operations from remote nodes configured as slaves.
      class  SlaveNodeSelector
      This NodeSelectorStrategy is a static configuration for the local node to avoid processing any indexing operations locally.
      Methods in org.hibernate.search.backend.jgroups.impl that return NodeSelectorStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected NodeSelectorStrategy JGroupsMasterBackend.createNodeSelectorStrategy(IndexManager indexManager) 
      protected NodeSelectorStrategy JGroupsBackend.createNodeSelectorStrategy(IndexManager indexManager) 
      protected NodeSelectorStrategy JGroupsSlaveBackend.createNodeSelectorStrategy(IndexManager indexManager) 
      NodeSelectorStrategy NodeSelectorService.getMasterNodeSelector(String indexName) 
      NodeSelectorStrategy DefaultNodeSelectorService.getMasterNodeSelector(String indexName) 
      Methods in org.hibernate.search.backend.jgroups.impl with parameters of type NodeSelectorStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NodeSelectorService.setNodeSelectorStrategy(String indexName, NodeSelectorStrategy selector) 
      void DefaultNodeSelectorService.setNodeSelectorStrategy(String indexName, NodeSelectorStrategy selector) 
      Constructors in org.hibernate.search.backend.jgroups.impl with parameters of type NodeSelectorStrategy 
      Constructor and Description
